post.body: Finally, I can go to bed... g'night world
Alright... I'm almost done... yay for four hours of sleep.... I can do this...
Ugh I need to stop procrastinating....
Crisis avoid.... I think....? We'll see what my artist has to say....
ACK!!! What do you do if your tattoo is blistered underneath?!
I think I'm pulling an all nighter.... I have too much shit to do...
Ugh.... seriously? What is up with bitchy people lately?! Why do you have to blame your shit on me... I'm not your bitch, bitch!!!
Alright, now I seriously have to finish studying for tomorrows Chem final... it's my worst subject
Yay for facebook distractions...
Is going to kill something....
Apparently I'm going to be an ASM... Weird... but yay!
Studying Chemistry for 5 straight hours.... not so much fun.... thank goodness for sorority eats!!
Friends make all of this so much easier.... I love you all!
I have paintings to finish, a final to study for and a mom in the hospital who's dying.... how do I deal with all of this?
Holy Hell.... I've done it again.... Sorry Twiter fans....
Time for sleep... I'm actually going to bed early for once.
Ghost is such a good movie. "This chair doesn't go with anything" "It goes with me" "Yeah... it does... we'll paint it!"
After a long day of work, I'm going to have some Mac N Cheese and relax wit movies alone.
Don't you love it when you take an hour break, and then suddenly have all this inspiration? I just completed a full painting and a Half!!
Break time! Hot cocoa and movies!
Off to see the mom
Time to do more dishes and then head over to Lutheran General to visit Mom.
The artwork of Xylia is breath taking!
Ah Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog makes me feel so much better!!!! I LOVE Nathan Fillion!! I would marry him!
Ugh... If I had to spend any more time with my family I'd have to commit murder... Now I remember why I rarely visit.
Hungry... going to chipotle... Yum!!
Ugh... massive alcohol parties are not good for me or my friends... no sleep for me when babysitting idiots.... ah well
Marry Me is an amazing Webcomic.... I really enjoy Bobby Crosby's writing style.
I seriously need to do some dishes......
Might get to draw for other webcomics than her own... this could get interesting....
Man, I really gotta do some dishes... OOH!!! This webcomic looks pretty..... *ignores dishes*
Chem final went okay.... now we wait to see what the grades are....
Holy Crow! The world got away from me again!!! Ah! Christmas cookies have been the death of me....
I can do this.... I know I can... *sighs*
He is worth it... I'm just hoping that I can pull this off
Trying to learn guitar just to play and sing a song for someone you love... He better be worth it.
Why do I pick losers as friends/boyfriends sometimes? Seriously... Maybe I should just convert to being a lesbian!
What the hell do you get for a Nerdy Artist guy who you have a crush on?
Gotta write more of the story... gotta finish paintings that are also gifts.... gotta do comics... gotta... gotta... NOT GO INSANE!!!!
Home, with sushi and rice pudding!!! YES!!!
Ah. Hello again world... time to go shopping for ingredients for holiday cookies!
sleep.... zZzZzZ... Sleep....
I hate it when creepy old men stare at my breasts....
FYI Oolong Tea = fabulous hot; liquid garbage when cold. This has been a public service announcement.
I'm in the mood to work on my story... I think I'm going to crank out a few chapters before bed...
Yay!!! I gots ice cream!!!!
I really really want ice cream even though its Ohhhhh -4 outside...
My family is driving me insane!!!! Anyone want to do something please?!!!??
Wrapping christmas presents... Is it bad that I feel like I'm going through creative withdrawal when all I've been doing is painting?
I'm done... done with all of this bullshit
I love when I turn frustration into productivity
I love my mom... but if she pees on me one more time....
